Book now

Dostoevsky

19, Vladimirsky prospect, 191002, St Petersburg, Russia

Description


Situated in the very centre of St Petersburg, the Dostoyevsky hotel, opened in 2003, offers its guests not only convenient location but also Russian hospitality, friendly atmosphere and high quality service.
The hotel welcomes its guests in the morning with a rich breakfast buffet served in an elegant restaurant.
Guests will relax in a cozy 24h "Raskolnikov" bar, located on the 7th floor, with a fireplace and magnificent view over Vladimirsky Prospect and Vladimirsky Cathedral.
In the Vladimirsky Passage guests can choose among many bars and restaurants like a Fast Food Restaurant "Food Court", Cafe-bar "Atrium", Sushi bar with Japanese cuisine, pub "Negotsiant", or Sweet-Shop "Baltic Bread".
The Dostoevsky hotel features 207 comfortable rooms. Some rooms overlook the city and the other cozy courtyard.

Rooms are equipped with:
  • Bathroom with a bath or shower
  • Satellite TV
  • Telephone
  • Air conditioning
  • Mini bar
  • Working desk
  • Internet connection
  • Junior suites also have a living room
  • 4 Executive rooms have bathroom with a bathtub, and an excellent panoramic view of the Vladimirsky Square and Church of Vladimirskaya Divines Mother.
  • 2 St. Petersburg/Nevsky Suites and 2 Dostoevsky/Vladimirsky Suites are two-room apartments, on the 5th and 6th floors, with living room, double bedroom, bathroom with a bath, and an excellent panoramic view of Vladimirsky Square and Church of Vladimirskaya Divines Mother.
  • Non smoking rooms are available
Facilities available to guests:
  • Fitness room with modern equippment
  • Internet access
  • Restaurant "Dostoevsky" serving Russian and European cuisine and wide list of wines and breakfast buffet
  • Bar
  • Sauna with showers and Jacuzzi and lounge with TV and bar
  • The hotel organizes city tours and country tours
  • Concierge services including reservation of excursions, boat trips, theatre tickets, booking restaurants, car rental, taxi service and booking air and railway tickest
  • Business center of the 5th floor with computer rental, high speed Internet, international phone calls, fax, secretarial service and international mail delivery
  • Facilities for the disabled
  • Laundry service
  • Banquet room
  • Elevator
  • Safe deposit box at the reception
  • Car park
  • The hotel accepts Visa and MasterCard credit cards.

Book now

We are searching for available rooms and prices. Please wait...

Location

The Dostoevsky hotel is located 200 meters from the center of St Petersburg, close to the metro stations "Vladimirskaya", "Dostoevskaya”, 500 meters from the Moscovsky railway station, 20 meters from the bus station and 17 km from the Pulkovo airport.

Tourist Visa support
30 USD per person

Persons checking Dostoevsky are also interested in the following hotels:

Anabel at Nevsky 88

The budget-friendly Anabel is located on Nevsky Prospekt, 2 minutes from the Metro and 10 minutes from the Moscow Rail Terminal, and offers free Wi-Fi. Wake in a quiet room, with rooms overlooking the inner courtyard allowing a peaceful sleep. A tasty complimentary breakfast is a great way to start the day. Between 5pm and 7pm, guests can enjoy complimentary tea and coffee at Anabel. ...
Antique-hotel Rachmaninov

Comfortable hotel set in the center of St Pestersburg, in a former house of the famous composer Rachmaninov, designed like a museum of noble life in 19th century Russia, decorated with antiques and old photos. Guests will enjoy photo exhibition and rich excursions program. There are stylish rooms with Internet access. There is one studio with a kitchen. ...
Apartment Griboedova 20

Modern one bedroom apartment including a bedroom with 2 double beds, living room, full bathroom with a hairdryer and kitchen, for up to 4 people or 2+2. ...
